Our Social Purpose

Our collective DNA is all about caring for communities by creating balance in the built and natural environments where we live, learn, work and play.

At MarthaMax, our Social Purpose is defined by our desire to do good while doing good work. We focus our efforts within three key pillars:

13

People

  • Our people embody the good reputation we earn daily as a great place to work, learn, thrive and give back
  • The programs we provide support each other and our stakeholders
  • We share one abiding commitment; to support diversity and inclusion

23

Community

  • We respect the spaces where people live, learn, work and play
  • Wherever we do business we strive to connect deeply with and learn from community
  • We support causes that "make a difference" in our interconnectedness

33

Sustainability

  • We focus on building sustainable operations and communities
  • We partner in ISO26000 and the UN SDGs to educate and unify our stakeholders in balance with social responsibility and sustainable development goals.

Through purposeful policies, thoughtful programs and innovative community activities we make meaningful impact and fulfill the deepest value held within MarthaMax, to create legacy through social purpose.
